full_description:
Smart 1 Ton Non-Inverter AC (Split Type SEA-112SS)

The Smart 1 Ton Non-Inverter AC (Split Type SEA-112SS) is a dependable and effective cooling solution for rooms ranging from 90 to 120 square feet. This SSmart 1 Ton Non-Inverter AC (Split Type SEA-112SS) guarantees uniform air distribution for maximum comfort thanks to its 4-way swing feature. A sanitary and clean cooling environment is maintained with the aid of the Frost Clean feature. While Dry Mode effectively removes extra moisture from the air, Auto Restart, Sleep Mode, and Timer Mode enhance user convenience. When necessary, the Turbo Mode quickly cools off an area, and programming and control are made simple with the LCD Remote. The Smart 1 Ton AC unit is made with longevity and effective heat transfer in mind. It has a 100% copper tube and anti-rust casting. Installing a Dual Direction Drainage Pipe increases installation flexibility. Your favorite settings are maintained via the memory feature, and the evaporator's Golden Fin and Hydrophilic Fins enhance longevity and performance. This Smart 1 Ton Non-Inverter AC (Split Type SEA-112SS) can handle operating temperatures between 20 and 43°C. It runs on a single frequency of 50Hz and a rated voltage of 230V. Measuring 844 x 310 x 546 mm and weighing 28±1 kg (net) and 32±1 kg (gross), the item has a sturdy build. Clear visibility and control are provided by the LED Digit Display and LCD remote. The Smart 1 Ton Non-Inverter AC (Split Type SEA-112SS) offers dependable cooling with an indoor noise level as low as 39.14 dB(A) thanks to its fixed-speed compressor and 25W mechanical output wattage.
